name: Francisco Rodr√≠guez
project_1_title: Amazon Stocks Predictions Pipeline with Airflow
project_1_description: Automated stock forecasting pipeline using Apache Airflow, Docker, PostgreSQL, and Python. Fetches Amazon (AMZN) stock data from the Alpha Vantage API, stores it in PostgreSQL, preprocesses it, trains a HGBR model, and visualizes predictions with performance metrics.
project_2_title: Statistical Analysis of a Marketing Dataset (in Spanish)
project_2_description: This project presents a statistical analysis of a marketing dataset using an R Markdown notebook. It includes exploratory data analysis (EDA), hypothesis testing, and data visualization to uncover key insights about consumer behavior and marketing campaign effectiveness.
project_3_description: This project explores predictive modeling for diabetes using an R Markdown notebook. It involves data mining techniques, feature selection, and machine learning models to predict diabetes occurrence. The analysis includes model evaluation and comparison of different predictive approaches.
project_4_description: This interactive Tableau Public dashboard tracks the global population's vaccination status by country, distinguishing between individuals with one dose, two doses, or unvaccinated. It includes time filters, a dynamic map for visualization, and comparative charts on vaccination efforts worldwide.
project_5_title: Waste Management Statistics Dashboard ‚Äì La Palma (in Spanish)
project_5_description: This Power BI dashboard presents waste management statistics for La Palma (2021-2023), categorized by waste type. It compares recycling container numbers and waste collected over time, providing insights on environmental performance trends.
project_6_title: X-Ray Pneumonia Diagnosis with Deep Learning
project_6_description: Developed a deep learning model to diagnose pneumonia from chest X-ray images using convolutional neural networks (CNNs). The project includes data preprocessing, model training, and evaluation with performance metrics.
project_7_title: Data Jobs Offers: End-to-End Analysis with Web Scraping and NLP
project_7_description: Analysis of tech job offers in Spain using web scraping and natural language processing (NLP). The project handles job descriptions in both Spanish and English, includes Python scripts for automated data extraction, and an interactive Google Colab notebook for exploratory data analysis (EDA), keyword extraction, and topic modeling.
